Class StudentHostingCardTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.StudentHostingCardTest
class StudentHostingCardTest extends Object
Class StudentHostingCardTest tests StudentHostingCard. Coverage 100% (Class, Methods), 74% (Lines, some exceptions are being handled but since they will never be executed (neither after deployment) they will not be covered)

    • fakePlayerSetup

      private void fakePlayerSetup(Character character, boolean autoplaceTestStudents, boolean initCard)
      Sets up the fake Players that will be used to test the class
      Parameters:
      character - The Character used to initialize the card
      autoplaceTestStudents - Whether the Students should be auto-placed on the test island (idx 0)
      initCard - Whether the Card should be initialized

    • fakePlayerSetup

      private void fakePlayerSetup(Character character, boolean autoplaceTestStudents, boolean initCard, boolean initEntrance)
      Sets up the fake Players that will be used to test the class
      Parameters:
      character - The Character used to initialize the card
      autoplaceTestStudents - Whether the Students should be auto-placed on the test island (idx 0)
      initCard - Whether the Card should be initialized
      initEntrance - Whether the Entrance space of the Player should be initialized with test values
